title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the correct content for different types of content in a database field. Specifically, it fails to handle three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags.
EB:
The expected behavior is as follows:
- For Plain, the output should display the literal content including any tags.
- For Auto, the output should display content 1, 2, and 3 correctly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, the output should display content 1 and 2 correctly without HTML tags, while content 3 should be displayed with RTF tags.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Create a database field with the mentioned types of content. 2) Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field and observe that it does not handle the different types correctly.
